#summary instructions to add the WORKSPACE path variable
= Introduction =
To run the test application in glare-dataservices-test, you need to a path variable to the Flex/Flash Builder environment. This variable is used by the compiler to find the services-config.xml which is located in the source folder of the project.
 
= Details =
  * In the Preferences dialog, go to General->Workspace->Linked Resources
  * Enable linked resources
  * Add variable WORKSPACE that refers to the folder in which glare-dataservices-test is found

= Example =
{{{
WORKSPACE - C:\myworkspace
}}}
And the project is located at
{{{
C:\myworkspace\glare-dataservices-test
}}}
